author: Ekta Chanana
title: Saif Ali Khan Awkward Moment When Karan Revealed Ex-Wife Threw Him Out Of House In Front Of Sara
text:
Saif Ali Khan's first marriage with Amrita Singh was a rollercoaster of happiness and difficult days. Their love story, which started on a fiery note, ended up being toxic as Saif's constant linkup affected Amrita. Their relationship turned sour, so much so that Saif once revealed Amrita would often abuse him and his family. However, not many know that Karan Johar left Saif visibly uncomfortable in front of his daughter, Sara Ali Khan when he brought up that the actor was thrown out of the house by his ex-wife, Amrita Singh. When Karan Johar made Saif Ali Khan feel awkward in front of Sara Ali Khan
Karan Johar is famous for taking digs at his celebrity friends for subtly bringing up the topic of controversies on his famous show, Koffee With Karan . In 2018, when Sara Ali Khan made her 'Koffee' debut with her father, Saif Ali Khan, in the sixth season of Karan's show, he left the two visibly uncomfortable. Though Sara Ali Khan handled it with utmost grace, Saif looked uncomfortable. ADVT.
ADVT.
It all started with Karan heaping praise for Saif and how he has been his lucky mascot as he shot the first-ever episode of his chat show on the actor's birthday, August 16, 2004. Not only this, Karan added another unwanted detail of how it happened right after a day Saif was thrown out by his ex-wife, Amrita. He said:
"Saif is my lucky mascot. Because the first episode I shot for 'Koffee With Karan' was with Saif. I clearly remember it was on his birthday August 16, 2004. It was a day after your mom threw him out of the house."
Sara, who was left shocked, wondered about Independence Day, and then she went on to wish 'Happy Independence to both of them'. It was definitely a bold way of dealing with the uncomfortable encounter about her parents' ugly separation. However, Saif called Karan, 'a slick guy'. ADVT.
When Saif Ali Khan gave Rs. 5 crores as alimony to Amrita Singh It was in the early 2000s when rumours were rife that the love in Saif and Amrita's love marriage was over. In 2004, they divorced each other. While Amrita kept mum on her personal life, Saif revealed how he was tired of the constant fights and getting yelled at. According to reports, Saif Ali Khan gave his ex-wife, Amrita Singh, Rs. 5 crores as alimony to finalise the divorce . advertisement.
Continue reading below
YOU MAY ALSO LIKE Influencer, Insha Ghai Breaks Down While Talking About Husband's Death Day: 'Ab Meri Life Khatam..' Published: Feb 5, 2025 | 17:55:05 IST When Abhishek Bachchan Discarded Sonali Bendre's Friend, Dipannita Sharma, Bipasha Basu Had Warned Published: Feb 5, 2025 | 16:26:09 IST Sara Ali Khan Instantly Gave A Witty Response As KJo Mentioned Amrita 'Threw Out' Saif Of Their Home Published: Jul 24, 2024 | 15:30:54 IST Kareena Kapoor Opens Up About Her Equation With Step-Kids, Sara And Ibrahim, Says 'We Are Family' Published: Aug 4, 2022 | 10:34:25 IST Amrita and Saif's love story, which ended in divorce
For the unversed, Amrita was twelve years older than Saif . Despite it all, Saif had married Amrita in a secret wedding in October 1991. After this, they had their share of ups and downs and remained with each other for almost ten years until their divorce. They parted ways on a sour note. A lot was written about their relationship. ADVT.
Well, the ex-couple, Amrita Singh and Saif Ali Khan, have moved on in their lives. They are co-parenting their kids, Ibrahim Ali Khan and Sara Ali Khan, while Saif Ali Khan is happily married to Kareena Kapoor Khan.
Next Read: Saif Ali Khan Had No Money After Divorce From Amrita Singh, 'I'm Supposed To Give Amrita Rs 5 Crore'

author: TN Lifestyle Desk
title: 9 'Healing' Lemons From Tamil Nadu Temple Fetch 2.5 Lakhs At Auction | Food News News - Times Now
text: In a fascinating display of faith and tradition, the Rathinavelpandiyan Murugan temple in Ottanandal village, Villupuram district, Tamil Nadu, saw an unusual event during the recent Panguni Uthiram festival. Nine lemons, which were spiked on the sacred spear of the temple deity, and believed to cure infertility, were auctioned off, fetching a staggering sum of Rs 2.36 lakh.During the nine-day festivities of Paguni Uthiram, the temple priests meticulously spiked a lemon each day on the deity's spear. As the festival culminated, the management auctioned these revered lemons, igniting fervent bidding wars among devotees and traders alike. People from far and wide flock to witness and participate in this unique ritual, deeply rooted in the belief that these lemons, spiked on the sacred spear of Lord Muruga, possess mystical powers to cure infertility and bring prosperity to families. The temple, situated atop a picturesque hill, is renowned for its awe-inspiring beauty and the towering presence of its main deity, standing at 5 feet tall.Among the bidders were Aruldas and Kanimozhi, a couple from Kallakurichi district longing for a child. Their unwavering faith led them to acquire the lemons worshipped on the first day of the festival for a remarkable sum of Rs. 50,500. The lemons from subsequent days also fetched significant prices, with the total auction amounting to Rs 2,36,100.Also Read: 3 Indian Names Win Big At Asia's 50 Best Restaurants AwardsBeyond the realm of personal aspirations, the auction symbolises a celebration of tradition and spirituality deeply ingrained in Tamil Nadu's cultural fabric. Panguni Uthiram commemorates the sacred unions of revered deities such as Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati, Lord Rama and Goddess Sita, Murugan (Kartikeya) and Devasena, and Ranganatha (Vishnu) and Andal. Additionally, it symbolises the manifestation of Ayyappan, adding to the spiritual significance of this auspicious occasion.As the auction concluded and winners received their prized lemons, the atmosphere reverberated with a sense of reverence and anticipation, underscoring the enduring power of belief and the timeless allure of ancient rituals. In the tranquil surroundings of Ottanandal village, amidst the verdant hills, the legacy of faith continues to thrive, transcending the boundaries of time and space.Here are 5 more unique prasads found at Indian temples:Mathadi at Shrinathji TempleMathadi, a sugary deep-fried snack, is typically enjoyed as an evening treat. However, at Shrinathji Temple in Rajasthan, devoted to Lord Krishna, Mathadi is offered to the deity. Afterwards, this special offering is shared amongst the worshippers as Prasad.Onions at Gogamedi TempleOffering onions at a temple may seem unusual, especially during Pujas where simple, pure meals are preferred. Yet, at Gogamedi Temple in Rajasthan, dedicated to the warrior Gogaji, onions are offered by disciples. Each devotee presents at least 250 grams of onions and lentils during their Darshan.Fish at Parassinikadavu TempleParassinikadavu Temple in Kannur, Kerala, is renowned for its service to the poor and hardworking. Worshippers believe that prayers here can make their wishes come true. The deity, portrayed as a rebellious warrior, accepts offerings of toddy (palm wine) and roasted fish. Following the ritual, these offerings are shared amongst devotees as Prasad.Dosa at Kallalagar TempleThe Kallalagar Temple, also known as Azhagar Kovil Temple, is a prominent Vishnu temple situated 21 km from Madurai in Tamil Nadu. Devotees offer traditional South Indian dishes like Dosa, Lemon Rice, and Tamarind Rice to the deity. Subsequently, these offerings are distributed among the worshippers as Prasad.Chinese Foods at Chinese Kali TempleIn the Tangara area of Kolkata, West Bengal, lies the Chinese Kali Temple, where devotees present Chinese delicacies such as noodles, suey, fried rice, and chops to the goddess Kali. Following the rituals, these Chinese offerings are shared amongst the worshippers as Prasad, offering a unique twist to temple traditions.

author: @23WIFR
title: Hands Around the Courthouse honors champions of child abuse prevention
text: Hands Around the Courthouse honors champions of child abuse prevention ROCKFORD, Ill. (WIFR) - Members of the community gathered Thursday at the front entrance of the Winnebago County Criminal Justice Center to remember survivors of child abuse and recognize the improvements made to help victims of child abuse and neglect. This year, the Hands Around the Courthouse ceremony honored the 2024 Blue Bow Champion for Children Award recipient, Mary Bawinkel. “We decided for the first time to have a Blue Bow Champion for Children Award, because we did want to recognize outstanding individuals that have gone above and beyond to address child abuse in this community, who have really put their heart and soul into their work and committed to helping children that are in a tough situation,” UIC Merit Director Shannon Krueger said. In 2023, nearly 170,000 calls were made the Illinois Child Abuse Hotline. The Illinois Department of Children and Family Services reports 217 children died by abuse and 178 children died by neglect in Illinois last year. At the end of the ceremony, participants placed blue pinwheels and ribbons to honor survivors of child abuse and neglect and increase awareness around prevention efforts. April is [Child Abuse Prevention Awareness Month](https://www.childwelfare.gov/preventionmonth/). More stories: [Hands Around the Courthouse, a reminder to prevent child abuse](https://www.wifr.com/2022/04/21/hands-around-courthouse-reminder-prevent-child-abuse/) Copyright 2024 WIFR. All rights reserved.

organizations.name: illinois department of children and family services

author: Daniel Dillmann
title: „Würden sonst Deutsch sprechen": Trumps bizarre Erklärung für Militärparade
text:
„Würden sonst Deutsch sprechen“: Trump gibt bizarre Erklärung für Militärparade
Eine gigantische Militärparade rollt an Trumps Geburtstag durch Washington DC. Die Feier will sich der Präsident auf keinen Fall vermiesen lassen.
Washington, D.C. – Während Demonstranten an der Westküste gegen die Abschiebepolitik von Donald Trump protestieren, laufen an der Ostküste längst die Vorbereitungen für die Militärparade. Am Samstag (14. Juni 2025) sollen Panzer und Kriegsgerät begleitet von hunderttausenden Soldaten durch Washington DC rollen, um sowohl den 250. Geburtstag der US-Armee als auch den 79. Geburtstag des amtierenden US-Präsidenten zu feiern.
Doch die Eskalation in Los Angeles macht Donald Trump mit Blick auf die geplanten Feierlichkeiten am Wochenende offenbar nervös. „Haben Sie eine Botschaft an die Kritiker der Feierlichkeiten?“, fragte ein Journalist den US-Präsidenten bei einem Presse-Meeting im Weißen Haus. „Wenn irgendjemand zum Demonstrieren auftaucht, dann werden wir ihm mit sehr großer Gewalt begegnen“, sagte Trump und wiederholte die Drohung sogar noch einmal. „Jeder, der demonstrieren will, wird mit sehr großer Gewalt empfangen“. Ihm seien aber keine geplanten Proteste gegen seine Militärparade bekannt.
Donald Trump schwärmt von „Panzern“ bei der Militärparade
Der Plan der US-Regierung für Samstag sieht eine gigantische Show der eigenen Stärke in Washington, DC vor. „Wir haben Panzer, Flugzeuge, wir haben alles mögliche“, schwärmte Donald Trump bereits im Vorfeld über die geplante Militärparade. Nach aktuellen Informationen sollen an dieser mehr als 200.000 Soldatinnen und Soldaten teilnehmen. Daneben werden Panzer, Flugzeuge und Militärgerät aller Art aus verschiedenen Epochen in Washington zu sehen sein.
Donald Trumps Militärparade: Infos zur Geburtstagsfeier in der Übersicht
Datum | 14. Juni 2025 |
Beginn | 18.30 Uhr Ortszeit (0.30 Uhr in Deutschland) |
Thema | Die Kriege der USA |
Umfang | mehr als 100 Militärfahrzeuge und bis zu 200.000 Soldaten |
Die US-Armee will mit der Militärparade in Washington DC an alle Konflikte erinnern, die das Land seit seiner Gründung erlebte: vom Revolutionskrieg über die Weltkriege bis zum Vietnam-Krieg. Jeder Krieg wird von 60 Soldaten in historischen Kostümen repräsentiert, gefolgt von 400 Soldaten der gleichen Einheit in ihren modernen Kampfanzügen. Außerdem werden hunderte Militärfahrzeuge in Washington DC erwartet. Die Parade dürfte damit anhand der Bilder, die durch die Welt gehen werden, stark an Russlands jährliche Militärparaden erinnern.
Panzer und Hubschrauber bei der Militärparade in Washington DC
- M1A2/Abrams-Panzer
- Bradley-Kampffahrzeuge
- Black Hawk-Hubschrauber
- Apache-Hubschrauber
- Chinook-Hubschrauber
Der Prunk zum Doppelgeburtstag kostet die US-Politik offenbar eine Stange Geld. Bis zu 45 Millionen US-Dollar sollen laut US-Medien die geplanten Ausgaben für die Militärparade und die Sicherheitsvorkehrungen in Washington DC betragen. Donald Trump aber hat dafür eine Begründung parat. „Zur Abwechslung werden wir unser Land mal feiern“, sagte Trump. Die USA seien das einzige Land, das seinen Sieg im Zweiten Weltkrieg nicht feiern würde. „Ich habe andere Länder angerufen. Alle feiern es. Dabei sind wir diejenigen, die den Krieg gewonnen haben. Ohne uns würden Sie alle sonst heute Deutsch sprechen. Vielleicht würden Sie auch Japanisch sprechen.“
Donald Trump bekommt die lang ersehnte Militärparade zum Geburtstag
Die Militärparade in Washington DC an Donald Trumps Geburtstag ist der Höhepunkt der Feier zu Ehren des US-Militärs, die bereits seit Montag (7. Juni) laufen. Der amtierende US-Präsident hatte bereits nach seinem Sieg bei der US-Wahl 2016 eine Militärparade in der Hauptstadt verlangt. Die Behörden des „District of Colombia“ hatten das aber verhindert, weil Kosten und logistischer Aufwand als zu hoch eingeschätzt wurden. Nun aber bekommt Donald Trump seine Militärparade. Das verdankt der US-Präsident wohl der Tatsache, dass seine zweite Amtszeit den 250. Geburtstag der US-Armee umschließt.
Doch die anhaltenden Proteste gegen Trumps Abschiebepolitik in Los Angeles dürften dessen Vorfreude auf die Militärparade trüben. Laut einem Bericht der New York Times mache man sich auch innerhalb der Republikaner große Sorgen, die Bilder von Panzern und Soldaten in der US-Hauptstadt könnten im Angesicht der Unruhen in Kalifornien ein falsches Bild erzeugen. Es könne der Eindruck entstehen, die US-Armee würde den Sieg über die eigene Bevölkerung feiern. „Das unglückliche Zusammentreffen der Parade und des Einsatzes der Nationalgarde in Kalifornien wird sich verhängnisvoll anfühlen“, sagte Kori Schake, ehemaliger Verteidigungsbeamter in der Regierung von George W. Bush, gegenüber der US-Zeitung.
Militärparade in Washington DC: Trump hält Rede zu Ehren der US-Armee
Das wiederum dürfte Donald Trump aber nicht abschrecken. Der amtierende US-Präsident ist ein Meister der Selbstinszenierung und wird die Militärparade am 14. Juni vor allem dafür nutzen, um sich und seinen Geburtstag zu feiern. Auch eine Rede Trumps ist geplant. Laut der Website der Veranstaltung will das Staatsoberhaupt „250 Jahre außergewöhnliche Dienste, bedeutende Errungenschaften und ein bleibendes Vermächtnis der US-Armee“ ehren.
Offiziell sind die Feierlichkeiten und der Soldatenaufmarsch in Washington DC aber nicht für Donald Trumps Geburtstag gedacht. Geehrt wird am „nationalen Flaggentag“ dagegen nur das Militär. Vor 250 Jahren, am 14. Juni 1775, hob der Kontinentalkongress im laufenden Unabhängigkeitskrieg zehn Kompanien aus. Der spätere US-Präsident George Washington wurde zum Oberbefehlshaber der so gebildeten Kontinentalarmee ernannt.
Damit ist die US-Armee sogar älter als die USA selbst. Die wurde nämlich erst am 4. Juli 1776 mit Unterzeichnung der Unabhängigkeitserklärung ins Leben gerufen. Noch jünger ist Donald Trump. Der feiert am 14. Juni 2025 erst seinen 79. Geburtstag und ist damit nach Joe Biden der zweitälteste amtierende Präsident in der 250 Jahre dauernden Geschichte der USA. Sollte er seine Amtszeit beenden, würde Trump seinen Vorgänger noch überholen, und mit dann 82 Jahren und sieben Monaten zum ältesten US-Staatsoberhaupt der Geschichte werden. (dil)

author: VNExplorer
title: 4 Zodiac Signs Set to Have Lots of Luck in 2024
text:
Photo: Unsplash
As we gear up to step into a new year, cosmic energy promises to bring extraordinary opportunities for some zodiac signs. In 2024, four signs will be blessed with an extra dose of luck and prosperity. + 4 zodiac signs that will attract more attention in 2024
Let’s explore the astrological predictions indicating that 2024 will be a promising year for these fortunate ones.
1 – Aries (March 21 – April 19): Beginning of Audacious Conquests Arians can prepare for a year filled with achievements and conquests. With Mars, their ruling planet, aligned favorably, they’ll have the energy and determination needed to reach ambitious goals. Whether in work, relationships, or personal goals, Arians have luck on their side in 2024.
2 – Gemini (May 21 – June 20): Communication and Open Opportunities For Geminis, 2024 promises to be a standout period in communication and social opportunities. Whether exploring new professional contacts or deepening personal bonds, Geminis’ natural communication ability will be in high gear. Doors will open, offering them unique opportunities and enriching experiences.
3 – Leo (July 23 – August 22): Shining on Life’s Stage Leos will be favored by cosmic radiance in 2024, providing them moments of prominence and deserved recognition. Whether in work, romantic life, or pursuing personal passions, Leos can expect a phase of success and visibility. This is the time to shine on life’s stage and reap the rewards of their efforts.
4 – Sagittarius (November 22 – December 21): Expansion and Continuous Growth For Sagittarians, 2024 promises to be a year of expansion and growth in various life areas. Whether through educational opportunities, inspiring travels, or innovative projects, Sagittarians will find paths to broaden their horizons. Luck will be on their side, encouraging the pursuit of knowledge and thrilling adventures.
Tips to maximize luck:
Maintain a Positive Mindset: Believing in one’s luck is the first step to attracting it. Seize Opportunities: Stay attentive to arising opportunities and be willing to explore them. Show Gratitude: Practicing gratitude strengthens the connection with positive energies around. Be Proactive: Luck favors those willing to act and pursue their goals. As we prepare for the upcoming year, these four zodiac signs have reasons to smile as luck will be on their side. May 2024 be a year filled with achievements, prosperity, and gratifying experiences for everyone!
